data.title: A sampling of sports venue projects scheduled to finish in 2024
data.meta_description: Facilities: A sampling of sports venue projects scheduled to finish in 2024.
data.text:
MAJOR LEAGUE STADIUMS

Los Angeles Chargers Practice Facility

Tenant: Los Angeles Chargers

City: El Segundo, Calif.

Cost: $270 million

Architect: Gensler

General contractor: PCL

Rogers Centre*

Tenant: Toronto Blue Jays

City: Toronto

Cost: $221 million

Architect: Populous

General contractor: PCL Construction

CPKC Stadium

Tenant: Kansas City Current

City: Kansas City

Cost: $117 million

Architect: Generator Studio

General contractors: J.E. Dunn/Monarch Build

Chicago Fire Training Facility

Tenant: Chicago Fire

City: Chicago

Cost: $80 million

Architect: Crawford Architects

General contractor: Pepper Construction

Sounders FC Center at Longacres

Tenant: Seattle Sounders training

City: Renton, Wash.

Cost: $68 million

Architect: Generator Studio

General contractor: Venture General Contracting

MAJOR LEAGUE ARENAS

Intuit Dome

Tenants: Los Angeles Clippers

City: Inglewood, Calif.

Cost: $2 billion

Architect: AECOM

General contractor: AECOM Hunt/Turner

Crypto.com Arena*

Tenants: Los Angeles Lakers, Sparks and Kings

City: Los Angeles

Cost: Undisclosed^

Architects: Meis/Gensler; Perkins Eastman

General contractor: PCL Construction

Scotiabank Arena*

Tenants: Toronto Maple Leafs and Raptors

City: Toronto

Cost: $258 million

Architects: Brisbin, Brook, Beynon; DesignAgency

General contractor: PCL Construction

Note: CAA Icon is owner’s representative

Phoenix Suns and Mercury Team member campus

Tenant: Phoenix Suns and Mercury (training)

City: Phoenix

Cost: $100 million

Architect: Gensler

General contractor: Okland Construction

Seattle Storm Center for Basketball Performance

Tenant: Seattle Storm

City: Seattle

Cost: $60 million

Architects: ZGF Architects; Shive-Hattery Architects

General contractor: Sellen Construction Management

MINOR LEAGUE STADIUMS

Hagerstown Multi-Use Sports and Events Facility

Tenant: Hagerstown Flying Boxcars (Atlantic League, independent)

City: Hagerstown, Md.

Cost: $90 million

Architect: Pendulum

General contractor: Turner

WSFS Bank Sportsplex

Tenants: Philadelphia Union II (MLS Next Pro) and Philadelphia Union Academy

City: Chester, Pa.

Cost: $55 million

Architect: OSports

General contractor: BPGS

MINOR LEAGUE ARENAS

Classic Center Arena

Tenants: University of Georgia ice hockey; expansion ECHL team

City: Athens, Ga.

Cost: $150 million

Architects: Perkins & Will; Smallwood

General contractors: J.E. Dunn/Impact Construction Management

Fishers Event Center

Tenant: Indy Fuel (ECHL)

City: Indianapolis

Cost: $90 million

Architect: SCI Architects

General contractor: AECOM Hunt

Frontwave Arena

Tenant: San Diego Sockers (Major Arena Soccer League)

City: Oceanside, Calif.

Cost: $85 million

Architect: ICON Architects

General contractor: Watkins Landmark Construction

COLLEGE STADIUMS

Jones AT&T Stadium*

Cost: $242 million

Architect: Populous

General contractor: Manhattan Construction Group

Gerald J. Ford Stadium*

Tenant: SMU football

City: Dallas

Cost: $100 million

Architect: HOK

General contractor: J.E. Dunn

Fudge Football Development Center

Tenant: Baylor University football

City: Waco, Texas

Cost: $89.6 million

Architect: AECOM

General contractor: J.E. Dunn

UVA Football Operations Center

Tenant: University of Virginia football

City: Charlottesville, Va.

Cost: $80 million

Architect: ZGF Architects

General contractor: Barton Malow

Jane and David Ott Center for Track & Field

Tenant: University of Pennsylvania track and field and cross-country

City: Philadelphia

Cost: $69.3 million

Architect: CannonDesign

General contractor: P. Agnes

Sanford Stadium*

Tenant: University of Georgia football

City: Athens, Ga.

Cost: $68.5 million

Architect: HOK

General contractor: DPR

Boone Pickens Stadium*

Tenant: Oklahoma State University football

City: Stillwater, Okla.

Cost: $55 million

Architect: Populous

General contractor: Flintco

Love’s Field

Tenant: University of Oklahoma softball

City: Norman, Okla.

Cost: $47.9 million

Ross-Ade Stadium*

Tenant: Purdue University football

Jack Turner Softball Stadium*

Tenant: University of Georgia softball

City: Athens, Ga.

Cost: $38.5 million

Architect: Goodwyn Mills Cawood

General contractor: RW Allen

Clemson women’s lacrosse, gymnastics and rowing venues

Tenants: Clemson University lacrosse, gymnastics and rowing

City: Clemson, S.C.

Cost: $37.5 million

Architects: HNTB; Garvin Design Group

General Contractor: Brasfield & Gorrie

COLLEGE ARENAS

Foster Pavilion

Tenants: Baylor University men’s and women’s basketball

City: Waco, Texas

Cost: $212.6 million

Architect: AECOM

General contractor: Austin Commercial

Memorial Coliseum*

Tenant: University of Kentucky women’s basketball

City: Lexington, Ky.

Cost: $82 million

Architects: RossTarrant Architects; HNTB

General contractor: Congleton-Hacker Co.

Midco Arena

Tenant: Augustana University ice hockey

City: Sioux Falls, S.D.

Cost: $75 million

Architect: JLG Architects

General contractor: Clark Construction

First Bank & Trust Arena*

Tenant: South Dakota State University basketball, volleyball and wrestling

City: Vermillion, S.D.

Cost: $53.1 million

Architect: EAPC Architects Engineers

General contractor: Henry Carlson Construction

Barry P. Gossett Basketball Performance Center

Tenants: University of Maryland men’s and women’s basketball

City: College Park, Md.

Cost: $52 million

Architect: Gensler

General contractor: Clark Construction

Wolford Family Athletic Center/McKenzie Arena

Tenant: University of Tennessee-Chattanooga athletics

City: Chattanooga, Tenn.

Cost: $34 million

Architect: Derthick, Henley & Wilkerson Architects

General contractor: Hoar Construction

Goschke Family Wrestling Training Center

Tenant: University of Iowa wrestling

City: Iowa City, Iowa

Cost: $31 million

Architect: Neumann Monson Architects

General contractor: McComas-Lacinas Construction

OTHER

Churchill Downs*

Tenant: Horse racing

City: Louisville

Cost: $200 million

Architect: Populous

General contractor: Calhoun Construction

AdventHealth sports park at bluhawk

Tenants: Youth sports

City: Overland Park, Kansas

Cost: $125 million

Architect: HOK

General contractor: VCC

Circle K Fieldhouse at NexusPark

Tenants: Youth sports

City: Columbus, Ind.

Cost: $33.7 million

Architect: Perkins & Will

General contractor: N/A

* Project is a renovation

^ Team officials said cost of the renovation would run into the nine figures.

NA: Not available

Source: Sports Business Journal research
